buildingOrderModule.simulator

Interface ActionType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BuildAddonBaseAction, BuildAddonTerran_ControlTower, BuildAddonTerran_MachineShop, ConstructActionCenter, ConstructActionRefinery, ConstructActionSupply, ConstructActionTerran_Academy, ConstructActionTerran_Armory, ConstructActionTerran_Barracks, ConstructActionTerran_EngineeringBay, ConstructActionTerran_Factory, ConstructActionTerran_ScienceFacilitiy, ConstructActionTerran_Starport, ConstructBaseAction, ManagerBaseAction, ManagerBaseActionPreconditionExtension, ResearchActionTerran_CloakingField, ResearchActionTerran_SiegeMode, ResearchActionTerran_SpiderMines, ResearchActionTerran_StimPacks, ResearchBaseAction, TrainUnitActionTerran_Goliath, TrainUnitActionTerran_Marine, TrainUnitActionTerran_Medic, TrainUnitActionTerran_ScienceVessel, TrainUnitActionTerran_SiegeTank, TrainUnitActionTerran_Vulture, TrainUnitActionTerran_Wraith, TrainUnitActionWorker, TrainUnitBaseAction, UpgradeActionTerran_CharonBoosters, UpgradeActionTerran_InfantryArmor, UpgradeActionTerran_InfantryWeapons, UpgradeActionTerran_IonThrusters, UpgradeActionTerran_U_238_Shells, UpgradeActionTerran_VehiclePlating, UpgradeActionTerran_VehicleWeapons, UpgradeBaseAction

    public interface ActionType
    ActionType.java --- The interface on which the Simulator performs its simulation. Each action that is considered must implement this Interface.
    Author:
    P H - 06.07.2017

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int defineCompletionTime() 
      int defineGasCost() 
      int defineMaxSimulationOccurrences() 
      int defineMineralCost() 
      TypeWrapper defineRequiredType()
      Function for defining the TypeWrapper that is required for performing / performing the Action itself.
      TypeWrapper defineResultType() 
      int defineScore() 

    • Method Detail

      • defineRequiredType

        TypeWrapper defineRequiredType()
        Function for defining the TypeWrapper that is required for performing / performing the Action itself. I.e.:
        • Construction actions require a worker to work.
        • Addon actions require the type of building that they are being constructed at.
        • Research actions require the type of building that they are being researched at.
        • Training actions require teh type of building that they are being trained at.
        Returns:
        the Type that is required for performing the Action.

      • defineResultType

        TypeWrapper defineResultType()
        Returns:
        the Type that this Action is producing.

      • defineScore

        int defineScore()
        Returns:
        the score that this Action is giving.

      • defineMineralCost

        int defineMineralCost()
        Returns:
        the mineral cost of this Action.

      • defineGasCost

        int defineGasCost()
        Returns:
        the gas cost of this Action.

      • defineCompletionTime

        int defineCompletionTime()
        Returns:
        the time in frames that it takes to complete the Action.

      • defineMaxSimulationOccurrences

        int defineMaxSimulationOccurrences()
        Returns:
        the maximum number of times the ActionType may occur in a complete simulation cycle. -1 counts as undefined and therefore the ActionType may be added as desired.
